Uses of Class
common.ImageReadErrorException

  • Packages that use ImageReadErrorException 
    Package Description
    common
    Contains shared foundational utilities for byte-level data handling and low-level operations.
    heif
    Provides high-level classes for parsing and manipulating HEIF-based files.
    jpg
    Classes for parsing and manipulating JPEG-based files are found here.
    png
    Functionality for parsing and processing PNG image files is provided here.
    tif
    Classes for parsing and manipulating TIFF-based files.
    webp  
    xmp  

    • Uses of ImageReadErrorException in common

      Methods in common that throw ImageReadErrorException 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      boolean ImageHandler.parseMetadata()
      Parses the image data and attempts to extract metadata.
      abstract boolean AbstractImageParser.readMetadata()
      Reads and extracts metadata from the image file.

    • Uses of ImageReadErrorException in heif

      Methods in heif that throw ImageReadErrorException 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      java.util.Optional<byte[]> BoxHandler.getExifData()
      Extracts the embedded Exif TIFF block from the HEIF container.
      boolean HeifParser.readMetadata()
      Reads the HEIC/HEIF image file to extract all supported raw metadata segments (specifically EXIF and XMP, if present), and uses the extracted data to initialise the necessary metadata objects for later data retrieval.

    • Uses of ImageReadErrorException in jpg

      Methods in jpg that throw ImageReadErrorException 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      boolean JpgParser.readMetadata()
      Reads the JPG image file to extract all supported raw metadata segments (specifically EXIF and XMP, if present), and uses the extracted data to initialise the necessary metadata objects for later data retrieval.

    • Uses of ImageReadErrorException in png

      Methods in png that throw ImageReadErrorException 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      boolean ChunkHandler.parseMetadata()
      Begins metadata processing by parsing the PNG file and extracting chunk data.
      boolean PngParser.readMetadata()
      Reads the PNG image file to extract all supported raw metadata segments (specifically EXIF and XMP, if present), and uses the extracted data to initialise the necessary metadata objects for later data retrieval.
